casebody.data:
STATE
v.
PERRY and Powell 265P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 22, 2018 Ms. Emily H. Davis, Durham, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Perry, Shenondoah Mr. James R. Glover, Chapel Hill, Attorney at Law, for Powell, Earl Lamont *396Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina

Mr. Daniel Snipes Johnson, Special Deputy Attorney General

Ms. Ann B. Petersen, Chapel Hill, Attorney at Law, for Powell, Earl Lamont Mr. Jeremy D. Lindsley, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for State of North Carolina Ms. Valerie Mitchell Asbell, Ahoskie, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of August 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of August 2018."
